after: o {{field}} should be a date after {{argument.0}}
after_offset_of: o {{field}} should be after {{argument.0}} {{argument.1}} from today’s date
alpha_numeric: o {{field}} should contain letters and numbers only
before: o {{field}} should be a date before {{argument.0}}.
before_offset_of: o {{field}} should be before {{argument.0}} {{argument.1}} from today’s date
boolean: o {{field}} should be true or false.
date: o {{field}} should be a valid date
date_format: o {{field}} should be a valid date according to given format {{argument.0}}.
email: o {{field}} should be a valid email address.
ends_with: o {{field}} should end with given letters ({{argument}}).
in: o {{field}} should fall within defined values of ({{argument}}).
ip: o {{field}} should be a valid IP address.
ipv4: o {{field}} should be a valid IPV4 address.
ipv6: o {{field}} should be a valid IPV6 address.
json: o {{field}} should be a valid JSON string.
max: o {{field}} should not be more than {{argument.0}}.
min: o {{field}} should not be less than {{argument.0}}.
not_in: o {{field}} should not be one of ({{argument}}).
object: o {{field}} should be a valid OBJECT.
required_when: o {{field}} is required when value of {{argument.0}} is equal to {{argument.1}}
required_with_all: o {{field}} is required when all of ({{argument}}) are present.
required_with_any: o {{field}} is required when any of ({{argument}}) are present.
required_without_all: o {{field}} is required when none of ({{argument}}) are present.
required_without_any: o {{field}} is required when any of ({{argument}}) are present.
starts_with: o {{field}} should starts with given letters ({{argument}}).
unique: o {{field}} has already been taken by someone else.
url: o {{field}} should be a valid url.
